definition: the act of swindling by some fraudulent scheme, equip with sails or masts
details:
noun
- the act of swindling by some fraudulent scheme
= synonyms: cheat
- a vehicle with wheels drawn by one or more horses
= synonyms: carriage, equipage
- gear used in fishing
= synonyms: tackle
- a set of clothing (with accessories)
= synonyms: turnout
- gear (including necessary machinery) for a particular enterprise
- formation of masts, spars, sails, etc., on a vessel
= synonyms: rigging
- a truck consisting of a tractor and trailer together
= synonyms: semi, trailer truck, tractor trailer, trucking rig, articulated lorry
verb
- equip with sails or masts
= example: equip with sails or masts
= synonyms: set, set up
- connect or secure to
= example: connect or secure to
- manipulate in a fraudulent manner
= example: manipulate in a fraudulent manner
= synonyms: manipulate
- arrange the outcome of by means of deceit
= example: arrange the outcome of by means of deceit
= synonyms: set up
